mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (uid, title, content, writer, write_date) VALUES (#{uId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT bid, title, content, writer, write_date FROM board b INNER JOIN user u ON b.uid = u.uid WHERE b.bid = #{bId};
SELECT MAX(bid) AS bid FROM board
SELECT count(*) as listCnt FROM board
